channel.title: 562 Duping or something
channel.description:
Basically, the player withdraws 17 of an item and their cash. Then they open up a shop, and click the "Buy 10" option. They get the 10 items without wasting their cash, and they repeatedly do it until they receive max cash. Any way to fix this? I've already disabled selling items to shops, but now players find it hard to get money.
help

item.title: 562 Duping or something
item.dc:creator: @Immortal_Technique Immortal Technique
